QuestData.Title: The Battle for Lordaeron
QuestData.Description:
King Wrynn has mustered our forces, $n. We mean to launch a full-scale assault on Lordaeron.
We'll drive the Horde from the keep and reclaim it for the Alliance. It's been far too long since our flag flew in Tirisfal.
Ready to ship out? Captain Angelica here will see to your transport.
QuestData.RewardText:
Ah, good to see you back on your feet, $n. Many others were not so fortunate.
<Halford lowers his head and whispers a prayer.>
King Anduin has returned to Stormwind Keep. He must plan what our next move will be.

Objectives.Objective: Complete the scenario "The Battle for Lordaeron."
